scripts.allure:clear: rm -R -f allure-results && npx mkdirp allure-results && rm -R -f allure-report && npx mkdirp allure-report
scripts.clean:reports: rm -R -f cypress/reports && npx mkdirp cypress/reports && npx mkdirp cypress/reports/mochareports
scripts.clean: npm run clean:reports && npm run allure:clear
scripts.scripts:parallel: CYPRESS_API_URL="https://34.118.125.230:1234/" npx cy2 run --parallel --record --key somekey --ci-build-id hello-cypress --env allure=true
scripts.post: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report && npm run allure:report
